RelatedSentence: President of the Socialist Republic Vietnam , Truong Tan Sang and his wife Mai Thi Hanh warmly welcomed President of the Republic of Azerbaijan , Ilham Aliyev and his wife Mehriban Aliyeva .

A1: the national anthems of Azerbaijan and Vietnam
RelatedSentence: The military orchestra played the national anthems of Azerbaijan and Vietnam .
The heads of state reviewed the guard of honor .
